caption: A young girl frantically escapes from a castle. In a prison, one man is visiting another man. The visitor holds a torch and takes a sip of water before passing it to the imprisoned man. They converse calmly, with an air of emotional restraint.In another location, several people surround a body in a snowy, icy landscape. The body is frozen stiff. They are discussing something and then depart.Inside a castle, a man who had been watching them earlier receives a letter and passes it to another person. In another castle, a young girl is being interrogated by a woman and another man.
